2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Don’t miss a modern-day retelling of The Dark Knight’s origin by the incredible team of writer Brad Meltzer and artist Bryan Hitch! Plus, all-new stories by Scott Snyder and Sean Murphy, Peter J. Tomasi and Guillem March, Paul Dini and Dustin Nguyen, Gregg Hurwitz and Neal Adams, new art by legendary Batman writer/artist Frank Miller and more!

Also in this issue, John Layman and Jason Fabok kick off the new storyline “GOTHTOPIA”! It’s a bright, shiny, happy place where dreams come true...as long as you don’t look at things too closely.

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Case of the Chemical Syndicate; Old School; Better Days; Rain; The Sacrifice; Gothtopia, Part 1 of 3: The Perfect Crime; Twenty-Seven

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: A “GOTHTOPIA” tie-in! Luke Fox has never been happier in his life. He’s tearing up Gotham City as its protector, and his father, Lucius, couldn’t be prouder of him. How did THAT happen?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Not All That Glitter

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Superman takes on the brutal Beast Lord as startling revelations are made about our Earth’s underground world! Plus: more on the mysterious Ghost Soldier!

Notes:

  • The Scrbblenauts Unmasked Variant cover is a homage of the cover of Action Comics #1.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Underworld

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: “The Outsiders War” part 2! Green Arrow fights for his life against the head of the Shield Clan, the deadly Kodiak! Plus, learn the tragic secret that turned Oliver Queen into Green Arrow!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Outsiders War, Book 2: Secret Origin

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Has Hal dealt a major blow to crime in Sector 0563, or has he invited the enemy to his door? New adversaries reveal themselves in an all-out effort to dismantle the Green Lantern Corps!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Harsh Realities

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The Earth bleeds green! Millions will die. The Swamp Thing must tear his very existence up by the roots. The Seeder story ends here!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: My Green Heaven

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Stormwatch debates whether to save Earth from the Kollective by teaming up with the megalomaniacal Extremax. Are they willing to trade one planet-pummeling peril for another?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Negotiating

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Cyclops has spoken: "No more Avengers!" Now Earth's Mightiest Heroes are on the run from the power of the X-Men! The Red Hulk attacks the White Queen as the Scarlet Witch joins the battle!

Includes material reprinted from Avengers #28-29 and Avengers vs X-Men #7.
In this tale tying into “GOTHTOPIA,” what kind of sick world pairs up Batgirl and the woman who tried to kill Jim Gordon — Knightfall?!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: A Healing Curse

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Nightwing’s being visited by an old friend from Gotham — the Mad Hatter! Desperate to protect Chicago, Nightwing’s been forced into an uneasy alliance with the mysterious Marionette. But who’s really pulling the strings?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Curiouser and Curiouser

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: John Stewart stars in this special issue! GL Sector Houses across the galaxy are being destroyed, and the Durlans unleash a deadly new weapon designed to counter the GL’s rings!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Forensics

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: A FOREVER EVIL tie-in! As Amanda Waller and James Gordon Jr. fight for their lives in the bowels of Belle Reve, Deadshot and the Squad struggle to survive a deadly trap that one of their own sprung on them!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Under & Over

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The son of Superman finds himself trapped with the Teen Titans in a future that may kill all of them.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Mind Games

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The final volume is here! Excel, who had seemed back to her old self, is now a stranger once more after making contact with something—or someone—beyond the forbidden portal. Will she be the captive in the end of a tragedy that happened so long ago? There is but one power that can prevail over all the mysteries of human knowledge—namely, the power of Excel's ego. You didn't think she'd ever forgotten about world conquest...did you? The ignorant masses will kneel at last before the spectacular conclusion of the aptly named...Excel Saga!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Vol. 27

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
“ZERO YEAR” reaches an all-important crossroads as Batman and Jim Gordon try to turn the lights back on in Gotham City. This issue leads directly into the final arc of Zero Year, which begins here next month!

Notes:

  • The Scribblenauts Unmasked Variant cover is a homage of the cover of Batman #1.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Zero Year: Dark City, Part Four

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The origin of Two-Face continues! Batman finds himself in the crossfire of a vengeful war between Two-Face and Erin McKillen! Both are hellbent on killing each other and anyone else who dares to step between them.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Big Burn: Ablaze

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Batwoman faces off against the new Black Spider as the mystery deepens! What do the wealthy citizens of Gotham City have that he wants? Will Batwoman’s overconfidence cost her her life? And on the personal front: Kate meets Maggie’s daughter!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Webs: In the Blood

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The Outlaws have their final bloody showdown with Ra’s al Ghul and the League of Assassins!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Demons

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: THIS IS IT: The final battle for The Red begins here! Brother Blood must kill the avatar before he can rule. But will Buddy’s new powers be enough to protect Maxine?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Evolve or Die!, Part One

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: A FOREVER EVIL tie-in! With the Justice League still missing, a barely functional Cyborg will need help if he’s going to take down the Crime Syndicate! To do that, he must find Doctor Will Magnus!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Forever Doomed

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Diana returns to Paradise Island for the first time since the Amazons were wiped out…but do those ancient stones hold the answers she’s looking for?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Unsettling Son

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: A “GOTHTOPIA” tie-in! We reach a major turning point in the series as the Birds find a new benefactor and a new mission to take down one of the ancient evils of the DC Universe: Ra’s al Ghul!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Loose Ends

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Kyle’s training with the New Guardians continues as he tries to solve the mystery of what caused an entirely peaceful civilization to go to war!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Keeper

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Part Two of Kara’s confrontation with the deadly new Lobo. After last issue’s shock ending, this issue we discover an even greater threat in Shay Veritas that will force Supergirl to make a deadly choice!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Beast in the Block

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
In this conclusion to the storyline “VOICELESS,” the illegal immigrants of Gotham City have been forced into slave labor by the Penguin. And Batman will stop at nothing to shut it all down!

Notes:

  • The Scribblenauts Unmasked Variant cover is a homage of the cover of Batman: The Dark Knight #1.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Angel of Darkness

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: From the depths of the ocean comes the Karaqan — a monster so immense, Aquaman doesn’t even know how to start battling it! And while he may have no idea what it is, the people of Atlantis do — and the LAST thing they want is for their king to try to stop it!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Life & Death

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: A FOREVER EVIL tie-in! There is now only one final obstacle John Constantine’s ragtag team must vanquish…and its name is Blight! Continued from this month’s CONSTANTINE #10!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Forever Evil: Blight - Redemption

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: There’s a new gang in town as The Red Lanterns come to Earth! How will the rest of the universe react to the Reds’ policing their new “jurisdiction”? And more important, how will Ice react when Guy Gardner comes a-courtin’? The cover’s a big hint!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Hot and Cold

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The Flash faces a mystical serial killer who might be responsible for his mother’s murder!

Notes:

  • The Scribblenauts Unmasked Variant cover is a homage of the cover of Showcase #4.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: History Lessons Part One

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Hex’s journey through the modern age continues! Guess whose attention Hex attracts as he makes his way to Metropolis!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Unforgiving Truth

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: A “GOTHTOPIA” tie-In! Everything’s all right in Selina Kyle’s world. As the fabled Catbird of Gotham City, she fights alongside Batman to keep the city safe. So why does it all feel so wrong?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Happiness is a Cold Gun

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The Parasite can’t be stopped—and he hungers for the power that Lois Lane possesses. Is there anything The Man of Steel can do, or will he lose his best friend? The answer will surprise you!

Notes:

  • The Scribblenauts Unmasked Variant cover is a homage of the cover of Superman #1.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Feeding Frenzy

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The Teen Titans must stop the evil Bart Allen of the future or our timeline is doomed!

Starfire, Beast Boy, and Cyborg appear only on the variant Scribblenaut cover.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: State's Evidence

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Softcover, 64 pages, black and white images.

Title translation: The Voice of the High Country.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: De Stem van het Hoogland

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: A snowstorm in the middle of Summer? Only one person can be responsible for this calamitous cold snap: Mr. Freeze!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Mr. Freeze Breaks the Ice

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
"Goblin Nation" #1 (of 5)

The so-called Superior Spider-Man has failed. Under his watch, the Green Goblin took control of New York's underworld. This is all Otto Octavius' fault. Now it's his responsibility to take the Goblin down.

Win or lose, this shall be Otto's greatest battle. Whatever you do, don't miss the first chapter of the biggest event in the entire Superior Spider-Man Saga!

The End starts here. Superior Spider-Man versus... THE GOBLIN NATION!

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: .NOW Goblin Nation Part One

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Featuring The Phantom by Lee Falk! Color features include: The Phantom by Wilson McCoy, Flash Gordon by Mac Raboy, Gasoline Alley by Dick Moores, Tarzan by Russ Manning, Alley Oop by V. T. Hamlin, Steve Canyon by Milton Caniff, and Casey Ruggles by Warren Tufts. Plus the following stories in B&W: Tarzan, Krazy Kat, Buz Sawyer, Sir Bagby, Rick O'Shay, and Modesty Blaise.

Roll up! Roll up, to the greatest show on Club Penguin! The Fair is back and it’s more epic than ever!

This issue is packed with puffle sideshows, big prizes, scary coasters and even a belly-busting fish dog recipe!

TOGETHER AT LAST! The crew of the Lost Light and the survivors of CYERTRON get a brief moment of calm as they take stock of who's survived DARK CYBERTRON this far. But things get worse-the final fate of the DEAD UNIVERSE reveals a nightmarish link to the greatest threat the universe has ever faced!

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Becoming: Dark Cybertron Chapter 10

volume.name: The Transformers: More Than Meets the Eye

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
DEATH OF A HERO! BUMBLEBEE! RODIMUS! ULTRA MAGNUS! PROWL! One will fall in final battle with SHOCKWAVE! This one is for all the marbles, folks-it just doesn't get any bigger than this!

List of Covers and their Creators:

CoverCover NameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverCasey Coller & Joana Lafuente1
SubSubscription CoverPhil Jimenez & Romulo Fajardo Jr.2
RIRetailer Incentive CoverMarcelo Matere & Priscilla Tramontano3
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Black Planet: Dark Cybertron Chapter 11

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: In Draw! #27, the professional 'how-to' magazine on comics and animation, we cover the 'Cover Guy', Dave Johnson! From 100 Bullets to Deadpool, Punisher Max and more, Johnson gives us an intensive blow-by-blow on the creative process that makes him a top cover artist for Marvel, DC, Image, and others. Also: Even if you don't know his name, you've seen Stephen Silver's work as one of today's most in-demand character designers, for shows such as Kim Possible, Danny Phantom, and Kevin Smith's animated Clerks series. Silver even has his own Character Design App, and will walk you through his approach to creating the look for some of the most recognizable creations in Hollywood. Plus: 'The Right Way, the Wrong Way, and the ORDWAY!' with new columnist Jerry Ordway; 'Crusty Critic' Jamar Nicholas reviews art supplies; and 'Comic Art Bootcamp' by Draw! editor Mike Manley and Bret Blevins! NOTE: May contain nudity for figure-drawing instruction; suggested for Mature Readers Only.

"ADAPT OR DIE"

The secret behind the All-New Avengers revealed!

The science war overtakes the world(s).

All the answers to the questions you wished remained hidden.

The collision of Avengers and New Avengers is imminent.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverMike Deodato & Frank Martin1
VarVariant CoverDustin Weaver & Justin Ponsor2
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Only Dirt... Six Feet Deep

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The Hulk and Bruce Banner battle together against the forces of Doctor Doom!

By Jason Aaron and Jefte Palo.

The Red Hulk, Machine Man and Alpha Flight tackle the Mayan gods in the awesome finale of 'Mayan Rule'!

By Jeff Parker and Carlo Pagulayan.

Reprints:

  • Incredible Hulk #15
  • Hulk vs Fin Fang Foom #1
  • Hulk #57.

That's right-the day you never dreamed would come has finally arrived...Deadpool is getting MARRIED!

First up in this ENORMOUSLY OVERSIZED ISSUE is our the main feature-the biggest wedding since that one guy married that other guy as Deadpool and his mysterious bride tie the knot in a tale by Gerry Duggan, Brian Posehn, & Mike Hawthorne!

THEN, we've rounded up EVERY writer to ever pen Wade's series to celebrate this magical occasion! No self-respecting Poolophile can miss this one!

It's the most important issue 27 in the history of comics! (this is of course a stab at Detective Comics issue 27, the first appearance of Batman).

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Wedding of Deadpool; Operation Ballerina Drop; #$%@-faced in Vegas; With This Hand, I Thee Wed; Continuity Spontinuity; The Niagara Bride; Fanged; Quickie; So Deadpool Walks Into a Bar...; Eulogy for a Winkie; There Will Be No Honeymoon; Savage Land:

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
This special arc with guest artist Jim Rugg continues!! Finn and Jake might have finally met their match. but what will happen with it turns out that the match isn't a match at all? Things are getting crazy in the land of Ooo and it looks like our heroes might need someone to save them this time around.

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.deck: The Brotherhood is back from the future, but what do they want?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
The Brotherhood of Evil Mutants from "Battle of the Atom" are back and still gunning for the ALL-NEW X-MEN!

Jean Grey came back different from her trial. What does this mean for the rest of the X-Men?

volume.name: Crossed: Wish You Were Here Interlude

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
“A DOZEN COUSINS AND A CRUMPLED CROWN,” Part Three

Not a new #1—not a reboot—not a paradigm-shifting crossover event... and yet, still totally worth picking up and reading, we promise!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: A Dozen Cousins And A Crumpled Crown Part Three

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Stefan Salvatore is the prime suspect in the grisly murder of a cheerleader! Will Damon’s influence keep him out of trouble, or place him firmly in danger?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Burning Love Part 3 of 3

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
RINGS OF THE MANDARIN COMES TO A STARTLING CONCLUSION!!!

The MANDARINS rampage reaches its climax. Who can TONY STARK count as an ally?

The TRUTH behind the Mandarins.

Can Tony’s Fellowship manage to defeat the Lords of the Rings?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Rings of the Mandarins Chapter V

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
THE PUNISHER VS. THE THUNDERBOLTS, PART 1

Writers Ben Acker & Blacker, creators of The Thrilling Adventure Hour and writers of the 2013 Thunderbolts Annual, take control of the TBOLTS…

…AND TEAR THEM APART!

Guest-starring The Avengers!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Punisher vs. The Thunderbolts Part One

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Chapters list :

234. Just a Monster (ただの化物, Tada no bakemono)

236. That's Enough (いい加減にして, Ii kagen ni shite)

  • Chapter 238: Isn't He The Spitting Image Of...?

  • Chapter 245: A Miracle Won't Happen
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: A Miracle Won’t Happen

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Heroing is hard work, so the team sneaks off to a desert island for an impromptu vacation!

But it’s hard to relax when the beach beneath your feet is the villainous Sandman!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Snow Day

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: In this new epic, refugees from Fabletown have returned to New York's Castle Dark, and Reynard, now able to shapeshift from fox to man, travels the mundane world to regale the animals with tales of his exploits, rubbing the other Fables' noses in his good fortune. Frustration at their restriction to the Farm threatens to become a issue once more! Can the animals find a way out of their situation?
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Mister Fox Goes To Town: Chapter One of The Clamour For Glamour

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: As the summer heats up, Garfield and the gang keep it cool with two all new stories! First, a tall-tale telling mouse stirs things up for Garfield & Odie, and then, Garfield must solve a whodunit: Who stole his Orange Meringue Pie?

He is known as “The Great Devil”—Heku, warlord of the eastern kingdoms, commander of a horde likened to the sands upon the earth. More than conquest, Heku desires the return of his son, Kobe, once coldly given as a gift to a king but now Conan’s comrade and unwilling to return to his father’s evil embrace. All Kobe has between him and Heku’s host is his sword and Conan’s friendship, a bond stronger than steel! Collects Marvel’s Conan the Barbarian #206–#214 and Handbook of the Conan Universe, never before collected.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Sands Upon the Earth and Other Stories

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: In his 75 years, Batman has been the central figure at the forefront of graphic storytelling. From the printed page to the big screen, Bob Kane's creation has never been a more significant fixture in popular culture the world over. This BATMAN 75 DAY COMIC 2014, free for a limited time, features the Dark Knight's origin from DETECTIVE COMICS #27 in 1939, as well a retelling of the story by New York Times bestselling novelist Brad Meltzer and illustrator Bryan Hitch and another short story by current BATMAN scribe Scott Snyder and artist Sean Murphy. Also included is a sneak peak at the reimagining of Batman's 1939 comic book debut, designed by Chip Kidd with a script by Meltzer. Join us as we celebrate the Dark Knight's 75th anniversary.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Case of the Chemical Syndicate; Twenty-Seven

volume.name: Detective Comics #27 Special Edition (Batman 75 Day Comic 2014)

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Hunt it. Trap it. Kill it.

The Armor Hunters are the most dangerous fighters in the universe – unparalleled in their abilities to catch and destroy their prey. Their mission has been long and unforgiving…and has featured the destruction of many X-O Manowar armors. For the first time, we see the brutal beginnings of the Hunters…and the devastation they have vowed to combat.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverMiguel Sepulveda1
VarVariant CoverDiego Bernard2

Notes:

  • An 18-part interlocking mega cover that includes the covers from: (Armor Hunters #1-4, Unity #8-11, X-O Manowar #26-29, Armor Hunters: Bloodshot #1-3 and Armor Hunters: Harbinger #1-3), originally only available through 6 retailers.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: A Call to Arms

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Terry McGinnis is pushed to the edge after discovering that Jake Chill a.k.a. Vigilante is the man who mudered his father.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Mark of the Phantasm, Part 3 of 7: State of Distrust

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Aunt Johnny & Earl discover they have a new serial killer on the loose, while Rachel spreads the word around town that she was murdered and she is looking for the man responsible! And to make it a perfect day, Zoe runs into an old classmate.

Who murdered Rachel? While probing her own murder and Rachel finally has tightened the list of suspects to two possibilities. But what she isn’t aware of someone very close to her with a shocking secret - one worth murder to keep.

Note: The digital edition (8/6/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.

Wonderland has been remade as a land of peace under the reign of the White Queen, Calie Liddle... but at its brightest, the sun casts the darkest shadows. A forgotten evil of Wonderland emerges and begins leaking through the barrier between Earth and Wonderland, and it is up to Calie, Cheshire, and the White Rabbit to stop it before Wonderland falls again... and, this time, dragging Earth with it.

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Renaissance Part Two

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: The Massive has been found! The story of its disappearance is as mind bending as Mary’s origin. But the solving of two mysteries only draws attention to the secret still unexplained: the reason for the Crash.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Part Three of Six: Ragnarok

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Each issue of Marvel Previews is a comic book-sized, 120-page, full-color guide and preview to all of Marvel's upcoming releases - it's your #1 source for advanced information on Marvel Comics! This October issue features items scheduled to ship in December 2014 and beyond.

This issue contains the single most bizarre, funny, surreal and outright weird story of the entire run of Popeye comic books! Wait until you read, "Thimble Theatre Presents Popeye in a Dismal, Distressing and Doleful Story entitled 'The Happy Little Island!' " Cast of characters: Popeye, Olive Oyl, Swee' Pea, Wimpy, A happy island and ten thousand nasty little critters!

VarVariant CoverShawn Pacheco2

In the grips of martial law, the criminal underground is going berserk – and the only person who can stop it is...Catwoman?!

Note: Hush only appears on the cover
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Divided

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: World’s End is here! Everything the Wonders of Earth 2 have fought for stands to be destroyed. Be here as their powers are tested and hard choices are made!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Collision

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Take a trip into the history of Earth 2 to learn the truth about the deals between Zod and Jor-El!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Secret History of Superman & Batman, Part One: Temptations

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Turns out being possessed by one of the most powerful entities in the universe can really mess with a guy’s superpowers.

Life isn’t always a straight line, sometimes there are curves in the road.

But if there’s anyone who would bend over backwards to reteach himself how to use them, it’s Scott Summers.

New York Times bestseller!

Deep in South America, Meru receives training from the oldest living agent of Mind Management and, in the process, gets a peek into what the Management was really like in the mid-twentieth century!

Filling in the gaps before the end!

The AV Club’s best series of 2013!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: The Eraser, Chapter 3

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: Batman stalks his mysterious, high-tech doppelganger as Lois Lane and a secret army fueled by the wrath of fallen and exiled heroes converge on Cadmus Island.
IN 6 MONTHS…TIME RUNS OUT!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Triage

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: A new storyline begins as Atomic Wonder Woman uncovers a new, destructive device buried under the remains of Gotham City.
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Earth Engine, Part Three

volume.name: Infinite Crisis: Fight For the Multiverse

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
Defending a planet from giant monsters might be more than the Bravest Warriors can handle, even with Catbug and Impossibear on their side. The team will need the help of an all-new ally and even newer tech to bring the beasts down in one of their most action-packed adventures yet.

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: [Untitled]; Praying Mantis Prom

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description:
76 Action-Packed Arachnid-Pages!

The Superior Venom versus The Avengers! This time it’s war!

Plus: The Superior Spider-Man’s war on crime draws the attention of Daredevil and Punisher! But are they friend or foe?!!

Also: Will the Sinister Six survive an attack by Punisher?!!

Includes material reprinted from Superior Spider-Man #25, Superior Spider-Man Team-Up #9, Superior Foes of Spider-Man #2!
Translates Batman #23/

Proper Japanese Title: 銀眼の戦士たち (Gingan no Senshi-tachi)

2014-01-01|2014-12-30.deck: Manhattan devastata dall'apocalisse zombie! Helen dovrà affrontare l'inferno, se vorrà sopravvivere!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.description: New York, oggi. I segni sono ormai evidenti, la peste invisibile si diffonde e l’apocalisse è prossima: i morti risorgono dal sonno eterno, affamati di carne umana! Per la giovane Helen, rimasta isolata in una Manhattan spettrale, sfuggire alla loro terribile morsa sarà come attraversare l’inferno!
2014-01-01|2014-12-30.name: Il Fattore Z
